com.intel.jndn.management.types

Class Route

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.jndn.management.types.Route

  • public class Route
extends Object
    Represent a Route object from /localhost/nfd/rib/list; see http://redmine.named-data.net/projects/nfd/wiki/RibMgmt#RIB-Dataset for details.
    Author:
    Andrew Brown
